Admiral.Title: Alidar Jarok
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([EVADE], [SCAN], [BATTLESTATIONS], or [TARGET LOCK]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [TARGET LOCK] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [TARGET LOCK] Token.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([EVADE], [SCAN], [BATTLESTATIONS], or [TARGET LOCK]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [TARGET LOCK] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [TARGET LOCK] Token.
